      • Message

        public Message(java.lang.String messageType,
               java.lang.String version,
               java.lang.String senderId,
               java.lang.String fileId,
               java.lang.String chunkNo,
               java.lang.String replicationDeg,
               byte[] data)
        Constructor of the message header and body.
        Parameters:
        messageType - Type of message (PUTCHUNK, STORED, ...)
        version - Version of the message (x.y)
        senderId - ID of the server
        fileId - ID of the file
        chunkNo - Number of the chunk
        replicationDeg - Degree of replication
        data - Body of the message
